description.en: During the subject three instruments will be learned: guitar, Estonian zither and flute. The basic playing techniques are acquired as well as main repertoire, which is needed in school.
description.et: Õppeaine raames õpitakse kolme lisapilli - kitarr, väikekannel ja plokkflööt. Omandatakse peamised mänguvõtted ning repertuaar, mida õpetajatöös vaja läheb,

objectives.en: Acquiring basic playing tchnique on guitar, flute and Estonian cither.
objectives.et: Elementaarsete mänguvõtete omandamine kitarril, plokkflöödil ja väikekandlel.

learning_outcomes.en: * is able to play simple chords on guitar
* knwos the basics of playing Estonian zither
* is able to play easier melodies on flute
* knows repertoire that can be used in general school music lessons on three instruments: guitar, Estonian zither and flute.
learning_outcomes.et: * tunneb üldhariduskoolis kasutatavat repertuaari kolmel pillil
